name: Chucky
films: All of them, I'm the star
text: What can I say about me? I'm smart, I have a  good sense of humor and my mother always said I am very handsome. And nobody can say she was wrong! You only need to look that picture! I love that picture... It's the one I have on my Tinder profile.

name: Andy (kid)
text: Oh, Andy... I HATE that kid. At the beginning was funny but when I discovered that I need him to escape from the doll that bastard didn't cooperate. And 30 years later he's still a pain in my ass. Fuck you Andy!

name: Tiffany
films: Bride of Chucky, Seed of Chucky, Cult of Chucky, Chucky(S1)
text: She's my lovely wife. The mother of my kids. And for sure there are better pictures of her but I think this one represents the most her normal mood hiahahaheha
